Cryptocurrency V7 Model Training Repository

Version: 7.0
Created: 2025-12-27
Language: Python
Framework: TensorFlow 2.14+

Key Features:
- Hybrid BiLSTM architecture for OHLC prediction
- 13 technical indicators for improved accuracy
- 20+ cryptocurrencies support
- 15m and 1h timeframe support
- Google Colab optimized training
- Hugging Face integration for model sharing

Training Time (Colab T4 GPU): 1.5-2.5 hours
Total Models: 40 (20 cryptos x 2 timeframes)
Model Size per unit: 4.2 MB
Total Package Size: ~175 MB

Start here:
1. Read QUICK_START.md for fastest path
2. Or see COLAB_GUIDE.md for detailed instructions
3. Check MODEL_STRATEGY.md for technical details
4. Full documentation in README.md

GitHub: https://github.com/caizongxun/crypto-v7-models
HF Models: https://huggingface.co/datasets/zongowo111/cpb-models/tree/main/models_v7
